195B
June 23,
fijci
FROM; Martha Haueisen, Secretary to Mr. Mull
R£: Attached copy of letter received from Mr. Mel son.
Immediately upon receipt of this letter, Mr. Hull was contacted
and he asked me to send a copy to each of you.
As you no doubt know, Mr. Mull is trying to snatch a brief vaca¬
tion. If it should be necessary to contact him, his Itinerary
will be on file In this office.
Air Mail
Special Del I very
